00030

00079 void CreateIMPAboutUsButtons( void )
00080 {
00081 
00082   // this function will create the buttons needed for th IMP about us page
00083   // the back button button
00084   giIMPAboutUsButtonImage[0]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_3.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00085       /*giIMPAboutUsButton[0] = QuickCreateButton( giIMPAboutUsButtonImage[0], LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  426 , LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 360 ),
00086                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00087                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPBackCallback); */
00088 
00089    giIMPAboutUsButton[0] = CreateIconAndTextButton( giIMPAboutUsButtonImage[0], pImpButtonText[6], FONT12ARIAL, 
00090                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00091                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00092                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00093                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  216, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 360 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00094                                                                                           BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPBackCallback);
00095        
00096        SetButtonCursor(giIMPAboutUsButton[0], CURSOR_WWW);
00097        
00098        return;
00099 }

00111       return;

00114 void BtnIMPBackCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00115 {
00116 
00117       // btn callback for IMP Homepage About US button
00118       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00119             return;
00120 
00121       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00122       {
00123              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00124       }
00125       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00126       {
00127             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00128             {
00129       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00130       iCurrentImpPage = IMP_HOME_PAGE;
00131             }
00132       }     
00133 }
